title: Loft like penthouse 4 BR/2.5 BA ! Near 6 corners! MUST SEE!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 302499454', 'Rent: $5,500 / Month', 'Beds: 4', 'Bath: 3.5', 'Available Date: 08/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Rent Includes:: Garbage, Water', 'Parking:: no parking', 'Massive top floor 4 bedroom 2 full bathroom & 2 half bathroom penthouse in the perfect Bucktown location.', 'Nearly 3,200 square feet of living space all on one level, sitting at the top of a gorgeous vintage brick building.', 'The main living area is over 30 feet wide, allowing for the creation of a stunning multi-faceted space that overlooks the skyline and tree-line Wabansia street.', 'Eastern and Southern exposures fill the space with natural light all year long.', 'The sleek, black kitchen has just been remodeled and opens to the living space.', 'Plenty of room for dining, multiple seating areas, in a large open concept setting.', 'White painted wood floors & exposed brick walls throughout.', 'Primary suite is bright and big, with a large walk-in closet and newly remodeled bathroom.', 'Great city views from the master bedroom.', '3 additional spacious bedrooms.', 'Large laundry room & powder room conveniently located off the main hallway.', "The retail tenant on the ground level is Olivia's Market; perhaps the perfect neighborhood store for fresh everyday provisions.", 'Just steps from Damen shopping, dining, and the CTA blue line station.', '* 14 ft ceilings, gas fireplace, stainless steel kitchen appliances, over the range vent, and granite countertops.', '* Condo quality finishes', '* Newly rehabbed apartment', '* Main bedroom has large closet with organizers.', '* Modern loft with fully enclosed bedrooms.', '*', 'In-unit laundry.', '* Easy access to North Ave expressway entrance/exit.', '* Damen Blue line subway stop is steps away.', 'FEATURES', 'Coffee Shop', 'Loft', 'Microwave', 'Small Dog OK', 'Walk-In Closet', 'Christianne Hendee', 'Licensed Leasing Consultant', 'Text or call 773.403.2787 mention Wabansia 4 bed', '•The Apartment Source•', 'The Apartment Source', 'Call or text: 773.403.2787 mention Wabansia 4 bed']
